name: Ocean Robbins
what_you_do: Ocean Robbins leads the Food Revolution Network and offers a Plant-Based Coaching Certificate program to empower individuals to become certified coaches in plant-based nutrition.
who_you_serve: The program serves aspiring and experienced coaches, health professionals, and individuals passionate about health and wellness, looking to make a positive impact through plant-based coaching.
current_projects: Enrollment for the Plant-Based Coaching Certificate program is currently open, limited to 300 participants annually.
bio: Ocean Robbins is a recognized leader in the health and wellness community, known for his commitment to evidence-based learning and compassionate coaching.
business_focus: Ocean Robbins leads the Food Revolution Network and offers a Plant-Based Coaching Certificate program to empower individuals to become certified coaches in plant-based nutrition.

jv_history.source_quote: Guided by John and Ocean Robbins, with more than 800,000 members and with the collaboration of many of the top food revolutionary leaders of our times, Food Revolution Network
world's biggest whole food plant-based event of the year – sign up now and take the first step towards a vibrant, sustainable future! \n\nJoin here: https://summit.foodrevolution.org
